A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am stunned by how poor this movie actual is.  I never thought Disney would let SJW politics into its products.  
You can not virtual signal the audience into thinking this is a good movie.  Star Wars was a resurrection of old serials and WWII heroism.  This throws heroism into a literal book burning.  

That is the underlying subtext that drove me crazy. Every interaction of Poe Dameron is where the proof is in the pudding.   The story itself is STUPID.  A 2 hour chase.  Sooo much filler.  Whatever. Boring.
